data.Summary:
Accomplished Technology, cybersecurity, and privacy leader with a strong emphasis on innovation and strategic vision. I bring specialized knowledge in DevSecOps, Cloud Security, Automation, and Agile Development Methodologies.

Specialized Knowledge: Expert in secure engineering practices, security automation, quantitative cyber risk modeling, and organizational risk management.

Skill Set: Proficient in cloud security, network security, SIEM, SOAR, identity and access management, encryption, continuous monitoring tools, and configuration management tools.

Regulatory Framework and Governance Knowledge: Knowledgeable in GDPR, CCPA, PCI DSS, HIPAA, NIST RMF, NIST CSF, NIST SP 171, FedRAMP, ISO 27k series, COBIT, and SOC 2.
data.Title: Chief Information Security Officer

positions.Title: Chief Information Security Officer
positions.Description:
•Implement cutting edge operational processes and  sound governance for one of the largest public networks in the nation.
• Advise and oversee cybersecurity strategy for the State of North Dakota.   
• Establish modern processes and bleeding edge tech to out-pace, out-focus, and out-smart the enemy. 
• Lead a top notch team of cyber warriors that strives to enable and protect the people of North Dakota in everything we do.

positions.Title: Chief Information Security Officer
positions.Description:
•	Promote a culture of security and privacy that exemplifies the value of the business. 
•	Protect company value while enabling massive scaling of enterprise information systems. 
•	Develop an innovative company-wide cyber and privacy risk management architecture.

positions.Title: Director Of Assessment
positions.Description:
•	Lead team of security and privacy experts in tackling third-party cyber and privacy risk for some of the largest companies in the world.
•	Developed product workflows and content for automating security compliance and risk assessments.
•	Work with industry partners to develop cutting edge risk management solutions for high value customers.

positions.Title: NIST Cybersecurity Framework Development Team
positions.Description:
•	Aggregate and analyze stakeholder feedback to determine potential updates to the NIST Cybersecurity Framework including implementation guidance, enterprise cyber risk management guidance, and privacy and civil liberties guidance. 
•	Research and develop recommendations for critical infrastructure sector guidance for leveraging the NIST Cybersecurity Framework. 
•	Develop risk management methodologies and implementation guidance for inclusion in the Cybersecurity Framework.

positions.Title: NASA - Master Information Assurance and Security Specialist
positions.Description:
•	Consulted NASA regarding secure system engineering and design for agency wide research initiatives.
•	Developed guidance for the integrity and availability of signal for unique operational research systems (SCADA/ICS) with meaningful physical interactions.
•	Earned NASA Achievement Award for security engineering and risk analysis for advanced network solutions to enable rapid, long distance, prototyping and design.
•	Developed risk-based cloud security assessment methodologies and cloud reference architectures.
•	Develop system security plans for major information systems and unique operational and research systems based on NIST Risk Management Framework and Cybersecurity Framework methodologies. 
•	Conduct security process development and improvement for NASA research and operational systems, including ICS, SCADA, and unique cyber‐physical systems. 
•	Consult with chief security officers, OCIO managers, and leadership to help build automated continuous monitoring and assessment methodologies.  
•	Coordinate the implementation of Fedramp System Security Plans.

positions.Title: U.S. House of Representatives - Cyber Policy Development
positions.Description:
•	Redesign cybersecurity policy and architecture for the U.S. House of Representatives.
•	Establish policy development, review, and change program inclusive of security subject matter experts and organizational stakeholders.
•	Leverage industry best practices and risk management methodologies to identify gaps and required updates for House of Representatives security program.
•	Develop guidance to address gaps and modernize House of Representatives cyber policy.
•	Work with House of Representatives staff to ensure written policies are integrated within operational environment.

positions.Title: HHS - Cybersecurity Process Improvement
positions.Description:
•	Assessed security posture and administrative controls associated with Indian Health Center financial and mixed medical systems based on FISCAM, FISMA, and OMB guidance.
•	Developed control assessment methodologies for financial and mixed medical systems within the Indian Health Service and tested controls to ensure compliance with the Federal Financial Management Improvement Act of 1996.
•	Produced documentation of internal controls consistent with federal requirements for Chief Information Officers within federal agencies.

positions.Title: NIST Cybersecurity Framework Development
positions.Description:
•	Developed enterprise risk management models and cyber risk management models to demonstrate interoperability between granular business/mission risk mitigation strategies and high-level enterprise risk management.
•	Wrote and edited guidance for implementation of the Cybersecurity Framework within the organization.
•	Partnered with subject matter experts and industry leaders to identify and enumerate fundamental cybersecurity concepts, activities, and controls.

positions.Title: IT Specialist
positions.Description:
• Responsible for upkeep of IT including point of sale, network, and information systems.
• Developed and maintained Drupal based website.

positions.Title: HIPAA Compliance Support Staff/TAY Program
positions.Description:
• Prepared and managed Protected Health Information (PHI) and Electronic Protected Health Information  in preparation for  HIPAA compliance audits
• Worked directly with consumers to ensure appropriate health outcomes and correct management of case records
